actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend "an act to provide for the establishment of the Buffalo National River in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes" (86 Stat. 44) and for other purposes

summary.text: Increases the amounts authorized to be appropriated for acquisition of lands and interests in lands within the boundaries of the Buffalo National River, Arkansas.

titles.title: A bill to amend "an act to provide for the establishment of the Buffalo National River in the State of Arkansas, and for other purposes" (86 Stat. 44) and for other purposes
